description: A versatile task management application for individuals and teams.

features.name: Task Creation and Organization
features.description: Create and organize tasks with titles, descriptions, and due dates.

features.name: Priority and Urgency
features.description: Set priorities and urgency levels for tasks, and receive personalized recommendations.

features.name: Collaboration
features.description: Collaborate on tasks with team members through comments and file attachments.

features.name: Reminders and Notifications
features.description: Receive reminders for upcoming tasks and real-time notifications for updates.

benefits.name: Improved Productivity
benefits.description: Efficient task management leads to increased productivity. Prioritize tasks to focus on what matters most.

benefits.name: Team Collaboration
benefits.description: Collaborative features foster teamwork and enhance project coordination.

benefits.name: Time Management
benefits.description: Set reminders and notifications for effective time management. Allocate time wisely by organizing tasks.
